title: Microsoft Cybersecurity Architect (SC-100)
subtitle: Design Zero Trust Security Architecture Across Microsoft Platforms
description: Design comprehensive cybersecurity strategies using Zero Trust principles across Microsoft security, compliance, and identity solutions
overview: This expert-level course prepares you to design cybersecurity strategy and architecture using Microsoft's comprehensive security portfolio. You'll learn to translate business requirements into Zero Trust security solutions, design security for infrastructure, applications, data, and identity. This course is ideal for senior security professionals ready to take on architecture roles.

instructor.name: Falk Krahl
instructor.title: Principal Cloud Security Architect
instructor.bio: Enterprise security architect with extensive experience designing Zero Trust architectures for large organizations

personalStory.story: Security architecture is about making the right decisions that protect an organization without impeding business. I've designed security architectures for organizations across industries, from financial services to healthcare. The Zero Trust model, combined with Microsoft's integrated security platform, provides a powerful framework for modern security. This course teaches you to think like a security architect and design solutions that truly protect.
